name: Dino (itch) (Dumb_Games)
description:
Help Dino reach his home! A remastered version of the chrome game.


The Dino sprites used in this game are owned by great artist Arks

https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters

The tileset used in this game belong to epic Kenny.nl

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/simplified-platformer-pack

!!<FOR NERDS>!!
